# Jenkins部署

# 安装weget

 yum install wget -y

# 安装jenkins yum源

  wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/jenkins.repo http://pkg.jenkins.io/redhat-stable/jenkins.repo

# 下载并导入yum仓库的key

  rpm --import https://pkg.jenkins.io/redhat-stable/jenkins.io.key

# 安装java环境

 yum install java -y

# 安装Jenkins

  yum install jenkins -y

# 创建deploy用户作为系统服务用户

  yum install jenkins -y
  vi /etc/sysconfig/jenkins

Jenkins git集成 →
